snippet: The artist, who works in anonymity installing his pieces on urban buildings, is taking steps to avoid arrest by securing permission from property owners.
abstract: Street artist Invader arrives in New York to decorate city with his distinctive, pixelated mosaics prized by collectors; mysterious French artist, whose over 3,000 works adorn over 60 cities as well as International Space Station, plans to legally place particular batch of city-themed works in hard-to-steal spots authorized by location’s owner.
lead_paragraph: The artist, who works in anonymity installing his pieces on urban buildings, is taking steps to avoid arrest by securing permission from property owners.

headline.main: Invader Will Bring His Signature Street-Art Mosaics to New York
headline.print_headline: An Artist Angling to Invade Urban Space
